sqlMap.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS security_information (account_name CHAR(16) PRIMARY KEY, password CHAR(16) NOT NULL, pay_password CHAR(16) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS balance (account_name CHAR(16) PRIMARY KEY, balance DOUBLE NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS common_information (account_name CHAR(16) PRIMARY KEY, nickname VARCHAR(50), real_name VARCHAR(50), country VARCHAR(16), birthday VARCHAR(50), phone VARCHAR(16), address VARCHAR(50), text VARCHAR(201), postcode VARCHAR(16), gender VARCHAR(16))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS purchase_record (id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, account_name CHAR(16) NOT NULL, purchase_date DATE NOT NULL, merchandise_id BIGINT NOT NULL, money DOUBLE NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS inactive_user (account_name VARCHAR(16) PRIMARY KEY, password VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, register_id VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL)
